channel.title: A very good and stable pk base
channel.description: Well i'm planning to make an very good and stable pking server. But not with those vesta and statius crap etc. Only dragon claws (if added) but not more crap. And it needs to have a stable pking and not much serverside-lagg.

Georgio[/quote]What are you, 5?

item.title: A very good and stable pk base
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

K guys shut up let me say somthing

Firstly , go to server downloads , DL WOESHIESCAPE or PWNSCAPE

Edit the client remove clan chat icon , or dl Bluur client : [quote=“bluurr, post:1, topic:278365”]If you get this error

[/CENTER]

Add this to your server

open player.java

add

public int skulls = 0;
public int hint = 0;

find

playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

make it look like

playerProps.writeByte(skulls);
playerProps.writeByte(hint);
playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

The client is based of the 317 deop many months ago.

Final download link

http://bluurr.co.uk/files/bluurrs%20client.zip DL LINK[/quote]

then about the source , u wil see config if u open source if u see tht
go to item.cfg, remove all things u dont want like vesta etc, and in client.java , do CTRL+F
and item id , for spec to remove and in special.java to xD

Then compile , run etc bla bla bla , and ur done xD

Crappy but good ,p Georgio :eek:

Read full topic
